text: Hersbruck () is a small town in Middle Franconia, Bavaria, Germany, belonging to the district Nürnberger Land. It is best known for the late-gothic artwork of the Hersbruck altar, the "Hirtenmuseum" and the landscape of Hersbruck Switzerland. ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.hersbruck.de/ – official homepage of the City of Hersbruck * http://www.frankenalbtherme.de/ – fun- and thermal bath Frankenalb-Therme Hersbruck * http://www.kz-hersbruck- info.de/ – webpage of the documentation site concentration camp Hersbruck e. V Category:Nürnberger Land
title: Hersbruck
